description: Number of binary vectors of length n+1 beginning with 0 and containing just 1 singleton.
comments: Number of compositions of n+1 containing exactly one 1. - _Emeric Deutsch_, Mar 08 2002Number of permutations with one fixed point avoiding 231 and 321.A singleton is a run of length 1. - _Michael Somos_, Nov 29 2014Second column of A105422. - _Michael Somos_, Nov 29 2014
